EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2017.Invite (Updated): EMEA/APJ: Reg is Open - E
EmailTemplate.subject: SpringOne Platform Registration is Open
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
SpringOne Platform San Francisco, December 4-7 Last year, SpringOne Platform brought together 2000+ individuals looking to learn new skill-sets, network with peers, and find out about the latest cloud-native technologies. This year, SpringOne Platform promises to be bigger than ever. There will be more sessions, about more topics, involving more tech. Executive and technical leadership looking to transform teams with the latest tools and methods will find SpringOne Platform sessions accessible and actionable. You’ll get practical advice from product engineers and customers and learn from those who have found success.
Register <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=S1P-q1-2017-leadership]]> Four Reasons to Register Early
Save money. Save nearly 25% off the full price ticket if you register by June 24, 2017.
Plan ahead. Commit now while your team still has a fully-funded training budget.
Show commitment. Are you going to break your “no procrastination” New Year’s resolution already?
Improve yourself. Plan to wrap up 2017 by learning from, and with, the greatest collection of cloud-native talent in the world.
You will not want to miss out on SpringOne Platform 2017, so register today <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=S1P-q1-2017-leadership]]>!
We hope to see you there, The SpringOne Platform Team
